item.description:
This will be our 4th and final 8th Congressional District Strategy Meeting for the April 5 Republican Caucus

(Boston, Cambridge, Somerville, Brighton, Medford, etc. this means YOU)

MIT Stata Center
32 Vassar St
Cambridge, MA 02139
7:30 PM
Call Matt DAvidson (617) 378- 5431 with questions or if you have problems getting into the Stata Center. You can also call Joe 857 350-0575

If you are interested in being a candidate for delegate to the National Convention please attend this meeting! We must decide on the 6 individuals to support for candidates at the April 5 caucus in the 8th district.

If you can not make the meeting but want to be delegate be sure to let either Matt or Joe know before the meeting.

Park in the parking lot (free at 7:30 PM) behind building off Main St.:
Location:
Follow the Ron Paul yard signs to the large oddly shaped colorful building seen here:http://www.mapquest.c...

http://en.wikipedia.o...

Our tentative meeting location will be room 32-144. If we can't meet there, look for a note on the door to redirect you. Call if you have probelms finding us.

Also this is easily accessible from the T. Take the red line to Kendall/MIT, and from there walk northwest along Main St. toward MIT (away from the Longfellow Bridge). You will see the Stata Center on the left after walking 2 blocks.
item.name: Our 4th and Final April 5 Caucus 8th District Planning Meeting
